ComicInfo.Title: To the Last Man, Part 2 of 3
ComicInfo.Summary: Imperial Lt. Janek Sunber wanted to see action, and now his wish has come true--in spades! Sunber's infantry regiment on the jungle world of Maridun is cut off from the rest of the Empire. Their communications have been destroyed, and their way out of the jungle is blocked by thousands of hostile native Amanin. Hopelessly out-numbered, they must choose between combat or surrender--but either decision may mean death! Empire takes a look at the Star Wars galaxy from the point of view of the Imperials in this action-packed, three-issue arc!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-31 21:56:31. [CVDB166756] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:31:44. [Issue ID 272821]
ComicInfo.Inker: Christian Dalla Vecchia,Davidé Fabbri,Christian Dalla Vecchia
ComicInfo.Characters: General Ziering,Captain Janek Sunber [Tank] (promoted),Captain Gage,Commander Frickett (death)
